metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Forgiven is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Forgiven has sections analyzed in the following keys: F♯ Major,  and E♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
